definition: to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

sentences.english: Many city vehicles have been adapted for use as school buses.
sentences.chinese: 許多市內交通車都被改造爲校用專車。

sentences.english: There's an airport bus that goes into the city every hour.
sentences.chinese: 每小時都有一班機場交通車去市區，逢正點開出。

sentences.english: I got up too late to catch the early bus.
sentences.chinese: 我睡覺太晚了，沒趕上早交通車。

sentences.english: But I'd suggest taking the limousine .
sentences.chinese: 可是我建議您乘機場的交通車。

sentences.english: There is a limousine service to the Friendship Hotel every day.
sentences.chinese: 每天有開往友誼賓館的交通車辦事。

definition: Hong Kong Wetland Park, in Yuen Long, New Territories
pinyin: Xiang1 gang3 Shi1 di4 Gong1 yuan2

definition: Mutan township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan

definition: attendant on an airplane, train, boat etc
to eat one's fill/to be full
vehicle/(more specifically) mobility vehicle (mobility scooter, electric wheelchair, Segway etc)
